Personal Website

Yonatan Bisk

Assistant Professor

Research Interests:

Grounding

RoboNLP

Vision and Language

Embodiment

Unsupervised Learning

My work broadly falls into: 1. Uncovering the latent structures of natural language, 2. Modeling the semantics of the physical world, and 3. Connecting language to perception and control.
